summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 KAWASAKI ZX1000E8F. THE CONTACT STATED THE MOTORCYCLE WAS PREVIOUSLY REPAIRED UNDER NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 12V064000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM) HOWEVER, THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE CONTACT STATED THE FAILURE OCCURRED AFTER THE INITIAL REMEDY WAS PERFORMED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MOTORCYCLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING. THE MOTORCYCLE WAS TOWED TO THE ULTIMATE CYCLE DEALER WHO REPLACED THE STATOR AND THE RECTIFIER. THIS FAILURE OCCURRED TWO MORE TIMES. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 15,000.
